root.text: Innovation is what everybody has seen and thinking what nobody has thought. This event gives a platform for innovative minds which will test how innovative you can be in your designing skills. The participant has to design a logo on the given topic using mentioned designing software and has to submit it in PDF format with a brief description on their design.
The topic will be given on the spot.

text: An entry could be by an individual.
The topic will be given on the spot.
A total of 1 hour 30 minutes will be given to design the logo.
The designing has to be done in Adobe illustrator / Photoshop.
Logo should be submitted in pdf format.
The logo design must be original and shouldn’t be copied from any other source.
Each entry should be accompanied by a brief written explanation of the Logo and how best it encapsulates its essence.
The logo should not have been previously published in any print and/or digital media.
The logo must not contain any provocative, objectionable or inappropriate content.
The judge’s decision will be final.
